item.title: Five minds of the future by Robert Gardner
item.description: About the book Author: Gardner, Howard. Title: Five minds for the future. Publication: Boston, Mass. : Harvard Business School Press, c2007. ISBN 9781591399124. 196 pages in the paper edition; 6hrs., 15 mins. as a recorded book. About the story American developmental psychologist Howard Gardner, Hobbs Professor of Cognition and Education at the Harvard Graduate School of Education, wrote this book to describe the intellectual skills and the type of learning he thinks will be necessary to succeed in the workplace of the future.
